summary: Diff adds a documented, executable Draft rollback procedure and scripts that deploy only the frontend canister, sets build-time env/version for Draft v35, updates the footer to display a build-time version, and adds preflight validation to fail if UI version labels donâ€™t match v35. One unrequested backend file appears in the modified list despite the snippet claiming no changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend source file marked as modified even though the request is frontend-only rollback and explicitly constrains avoiding backend changes/deploys.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is for a frontend-only rollback workflow; any backend code changes are out of scope. Diff summary lists a backend file under MODIFIED FILES.
